qInstructions: Please answer all 7 question by clicking the point on the 1–7 scale that best represents your experience.

questions.qInstructions: Please choose one option for each statement… (page 1 / 2)

qData.qText: How safe did you feel while walking in the exoskeleton?
How much resistance was the exoskeleton giving to your movements when walking in the exoskeleton?
How natural could you walk with the exoskeleton?
How comfortable were the movements while walking in the exoskeleton?
